mapper.select:
SELECT tk_ticket_strategy.* FROM tk_ticket_strategy WHERE 1=1
AND tk_ticket_strategy.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.execute_department_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{executeDepartmentId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.execute_department_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{executeDepartmentName},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.type_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{typeId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.type_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{typeName},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.practices LIKE CONCAT('%',#{practices},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.practices_step LIKE CONCAT('%',#{practicesStep},'%')
AND tk_ticket_strategy.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
